label: AI Value Calculator (CSP Compatible)
description: Interactive AI productivity and efficiency calculator with ROI analysis - HubSpot CSP compatible version
help_text: Add this module to any page to provide visitors with an interactive calculator for estimating AI implementation value, productivity gains, and ROI. This version is optimized for HubSpot's Content Security Policy.

fields.name: ai_calculator_title
fields.label: Calculator Title
fields.help_text: Main title displayed at the top of the calculator

fields.name: ai_calculator_subtitle
fields.label: Calculator Subtitle
fields.default: An Interactive Tool to Estimate Efficiency and Productivity Lift from AI.
fields.help_text: Subtitle description displayed below the main title

fields.name: calculator_height
fields.label: Calculator Height (px)
fields.help_text: Height of the calculator iframe in pixels
